meanings.definition: A style of Japanese comic books and graphic novels, typically aimed at adults as well as children.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading manga with colorful illustrations.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore has a section dedicated to manga.
meanings.sent3: My friend dressed up as a manga character for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she delved into the world of manga.
meanings.sent5: The manga artist's creativity knows no bounds.

meanings.sent1: The newspaper includes a manga in the entertainment section.
meanings.sent2: My favorite manga in the newspaper is about a mischievous cat.
meanings.sent3: The manga in today's paper made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The characters in the manga seemed to jump off the page.
meanings.sent5: The simple humor in the manga brightened my day.
